head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths KNAPP, ROBERT P., JR.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths KNAPP, ROBERT P., JR.

block.p: KNAPP-Robert P., Jr. 82, on June 14, 2000 in Redding, CT. Beloved husband of 57 years of Elise Ford Knapp; adored father of David M. Knapp, Michal K. Brownell, Robert P. Knapp III and Frederic H. Knapp; also survived by twelve grandchildren and two greatgrandchildren. A memorial service will be held at 2pm, June 25, 2000 at Christ Church, Route 58, Redding Ridge, CT. In lieu of flowers contributions may be sent to the Redding Land Trust, Box 76, Redding Center, CT 06875
